description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Vegetable Rice Paper Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Vegetable Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large avocado, peeled, seeded, sliced lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Halve cucumbers lengthwise and, using a teaspoon, scoop out seeds and discard. Cut into thin strips.
Working with 1 sheet of rice paper at a time, dip into warm water for about 10 seconds, turning until it begins to soften. Drain excess water. Lay on a clean work surface.
Place a few slices of avocado, carrot, cucumber, chicken, lettuce and 2 chives at one side of the wrapper.
Fold base and sides of wrapper over filling and roll up firmly to enclose. Transfer to a plate and cover with a damp cloth. Repeat.
For dipping sauce, combine remaining ingredients with 1/4 cup water and mix well. Serve rolls with coriander sprigs and sauce.
